Etoys Lawsuit Update

29 Dec 1999

eToys.com has just 'decided not to press' in its lawsuit for trademark infringement against etoy! Wired has the full scoop

This is a step in the right direction, but there are still a lot of issues to resolve about domain name hijacking.. More to come soon...
